decision_conditions: The information submitted in respect of discharging condition 3 (large scale drawings of replacement and new windows) and Condition 5 (facing materials) is considered insufficient and inadequate, as it fails to demonstrate that the development would be in keeping and character with the existing building and surrounding Church Street Conservation Area.  As conditions cannot be part discharged, condition number 4 and 10 still requires discharge.  Therefore, the details submitted do not acceptably comply with London Plan D3 and HC1, Local Plan Policies CP30 and CP31, Development Management Document Policies DMD37 and DMD44 and the Lakes Conservation Area Character Appraisal.
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/01120/FUL:  large scale drawings of replacement and new windows (3), method of removing exterior paint (4), facing materials (5) and construction dust management plan (10) in respect of the erection of a first, second floor rear extensions and roof alterations to facilitate six self-contained units consisting of two 2-bed 4 person, one 2-bed 3 person, two 1-bed 2 person and one 1-bed 1 person and roof terraces, associated refuse storage and cycle parking. Plus, the retention of existing single storey rear extension and canopy as well as alterations to the fenestration and mechanical plant.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
